body.name: Nuwave Whole House Air Purifiers, Oxypure Smart Air Purifier with 5 Stage Tower Structure Air Filter, Air Quality & Odor Sensors, Sleep Mode for Bedroom, Remove 99.99% of Dust, Smoke, Pollen, Allergen

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Air Purifier with 5 HEPA/Carbon Combo Filters
Air Purifier with 9 HEPA/Carbon Combo Filters

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 16 hrs 21 mins
features: PERFECT FOR ULTRA-LARGE ROOMS: Improve indoor air circulation and purify 2,934ft² spaces in 60 minutes, or 586ft² in 12 minutes (CADR: 664.6 m³/h). The top-performing air purifier is perfect for large room, office, high ceilings, and open-concept spaces.

UNPARALLELED 5-LAYER PROTECTION: Dynamic combination of a stainless steel pre-filter, ozone emission removal filter, True HEPA and Carbon filter, and Bio-Guard filter effectively captures 100% of 0.09-micron particles in the air, including pollen, pollutants, smoke, pet dander, dust, and other allergens. It also eliminates toxic Ozone in the home to less than 1 ppb, offering an ozone free space.

AIR QUALITY & ODOR TWO SENSORS IN ONE: This Air Purifier features two sensors to detect both air particles and smells, including smoke and pet smell, automatically adjust the fan speed and deliver real-time readings. A perfect air purifier choice for pets’ parents and smokers.

AIR PURIFIER WITH WASHABLE FILTERS: This air purifier is designed to eliminate costly replacements. The Never-Rust stainless-steel pre-filter and Bio-Guard filter are washable and reusable for up to 20 years. Ozone emission removal filter is reusable up to 20 years. The True HEPA and Carbon filter is replaceable in every 12 months. Search for B0BCS8W996 or NuWave HEPA/Carbon Combo Filter to find replacement filter. NuWave filters provide the best fit and filtration, while off-brand filters are unreliable and may damage the air purifier.

SMART AUTO MODE: The OxyPure Hepa Air Purifier can automatically adapt to its surroundings by adjusting fan speeds based on the room’s air quality with the built-in auto mode feature, adjusting purification to the necessary level and saving energy when it’s not needed.

FILTER ALERTS: The air filter indicator tells you when the Bio-Guard filter needs to be cleaned and the True HEPA and Carbon filter need to be replaced for maximum efficiency, based on how much air they have processed.

WIFI CAPABLE: OxyPure is WIFI capable. You can connect remotely to monitor and control the air quality in your home anytime, anywhere from an app on your phone. The app is compatible with both Android and iPhones.

ALLERGY RELIEF & BETTER SLEEP – National Sleep Foundation found that sleep is dramatically impaired by allergy symptoms. OxyPure promotes better sleep by eliminating airborne allergens that can irritate the sinuses, nasal passages, and lungs.
NIGHT-TIME SLEEP MODE - OxyPure is designed with Night-Time mode. All indicator lights turn off and fan operates at whisper-quiet level at 31.4 dB to help promote ideal sleeping conditions.

WHAT'S INCLUDED – 1 owner's manual, 1 stainless-steel pre-filter, 1 ozone emission removal filter, 1 Bio-Guard filter, 1 HEPA/carbon combo filter & 4 additional filters included as a bonus. For the first 5 years, there is ZERO filter replacement cost. (Voltage: 120 V, Wattage: 125 W / 128 W.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Whole-Home Air Purifier
reviews.reviewText: This whole house air purifier works great and is most reasonably-priced of all kinds that I looked at. I keep it set on Auto, so it runs on its lowest setting and automatically increases as it detects impurities or odors in the air. Also, it has 5 filters, only one of which needs replacing annually and the rest are washable. The machine also tells you when the filters need to be cleaned!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best filter I’ve had despite the auto stopped working after a month
reviews.reviewText: So thrilled it came with an extra set of filters although I hope I can find them still in 20 years once they need changing. Well not all of them last 20 years so read the manual.The auto feature worked great for a month then stopped working. I did my best to clean the auto sensor and had no success getting it to work as well on auto mode. That said I just use the app now from my phone to control its features.Best air filter I’ve had. When my roommate cooked with oil or if any smoke occurs this thing really does a good job. The house smells great and now there is minimal dust in the place.It’s not cheap but worth it for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First impressions review…. Quiet and powerful….
reviews.reviewText: First impressions of the NuWave air purifier, big, powerful, nice looking and very quiet on lower settings. Even on top setting where it blows a heck of a lot of air it isn’t impossible to sit next to it.The Nuwave is a lot bigger than my Sans but with comes with obviously a much more powerful fan and has the added flexibility of an app to control it. I decided to get a second purifier for the main part of the house and use the Sans in my often dusty bedroom. I like the Sans but was drawn to the NuWave as it has several filters and a couple of them are washable and they provide spares of the other filters. There should be no filter replacement costs for five years at least. In fact when I got it there was a sticker saying if I registered my NuWave they will send me figure spare filters for free. I will update the review if anything changes but right now I am delighted with my purchase. Let’s see how it performs over the coming days!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Air Purifier
reviews.reviewText: We love our Nuwave OxyPure Smart Air Purifier. It cleans our whole house, 2700 sq ft. We have had a lot of construction lately in our house which resulted in sheet rock dust everywhere (repiping) and dust from installing 10 replacement windows. Once we received it and set it up, we have been extremely impressed. We notice a big change in the air we breathe now and are excited to know it is cleaning our house. Two years ago, we bought 2 small air purifiers for our bedroom and den which we were very happy with, and still are. But now, just to have the Nuwave cleaning all the rooms we are very excited. It was so easy to set up and we love that it's on rollers and easy to move should we choose. We placed it in the center of our house and it easily tackles the big jobs. We laugh when we are cooking, especially fish. Once the aroma reaches the Nuwave, it gears up and tackles the fish smell, which disappears in minutes -- which is amazing. No buyer's remorse here, just wish we would have bought this long ago.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We had a problem where it wouldn’t shut off so they had us mail to them they fixed it and all on them I didn’t have to pay shiy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great unit to filter a large area
reviews.reviewText: This unit is easy to use and works when you need it.We have it in our restaurant seating area which is about 4800 cu Ft. This unit is supposed to take care of 2500 cu Ft, I believe. However, it works great in our seating area of 20X20X12.I noticed it instantly detects foul orders (dirty mop buckets, garbage cans rolling next to it) and instantly kicks into another gear to clear the air when in auto.The turbo button (not sure it's called "turbo") is a a good way to prep the area if you know you'll be working in the area. We just opened and this came in handy during and after our restoration.It is quiet and looks really nice. It is easy to move and has many control options. We use the auto mode while open and manually turn it off at night. It has a timer and scheduler but we've not used those features yet. There are a lot of filters and many extra filters. That's a nice bonus.A little on the pricey side, but for the volume of air we ask it to clean, and all its features, it's worth the investment.Strange this is, after I've been working all day and stand next to this unit, it kicks into high gear and the indicators show "dirty"... Maybe it's trying to tell me I need a shower? ... I take it that the sensor is tuned to sense humidity and sweat and reacts to conditions in the air.Love this unit, I recommend purchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Health is here
reviews.reviewText: This is a recommended item for in house health - it cleans the air - very good item - highly recommend this for your house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love it. Works great. Was worth every penny it cost. Much less dust and smells in our house when it is running. Nice and quiet. Easy to clean and move from room to room when needed. Had many other air purifiers and this one is the best.
